SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.glassfish.gmbal
Interface AMX

All Known Implementing Classes:
AMXClient, AMXImpl
@ManagedObject
@Description(value="Base interface for any MBean that works in the AMX framework")
public interface AMX

Base interface supported by all AMX MBeans. All MBeans generated by gmbal comply with this interface, which means that the attributes and operations defined in this Java interface all appear in each MBean generated by calling ManagedObjectManager.register.

Constant Field Values

META_PATH_PART

static final java.lang.String META_PATH_PART
The name part to be used for this item's "path". By convention this is the MBean's type, but could be something else, such as its XML element type (for config MBeans).

See Also:

META_SUB_TYPES

static final java.lang.String META_SUB_TYPES
Gives the allowed subtypes of this node. If empty (the default), any types are allowed.

Method Detail

getName

@ManagedAttribute
@Description(value="Return the name of this MBean.")
java.lang.String getName()
Usually the same as the ObjectName 'name' property, but can differ if the actual name contains characters that must be escaped for an ObjectName and/or if the MBean has a mutable name attribute. The type property can be obtained from the ObjectName

getMeta

java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?> getMeta()
Get all metadata about this MBean. See META_SINGLETON et al.

Returns:
The descriptor, which will be a ModelMBeanInfoSupport instance.

getContainer

@ManagedAttribute
@Description(value="The container that contains this MBean")
AMX getContainer()
"go up one level": the MBean containing this one, can be null for root

Returns:
The container of this MBean (null if already at root).

getContained

@ManagedAttribute
@Description(value="All children of this AMX MBean")
AMX[] getContained()
Containment hierarchy: Get all AMX contained by this one, in no particular order. Valid only if isContainer(). Note that using an array sidesteps Map/Set/OpenType issues

Returns:
All children of this AMX MBean.

getContained

@ManagedOperation
@ParameterNames(value="type")
@Description(value="get all AMX MBeans of the specified type that are children this AMX MBean")
AMX[] getContained(java.lang.String type)
get all AMX of the specified types, in no particular order

Parameters:
type - The desired type of children.
Returns:
An array of children of the given type.
